objects.text:
• LED Display Shows Battery Level
• High-Quality Sound with Deep Bass
• Advanced Touch Controls
• IPX5 Water-Resistant Design

product_details.name: Crystal Clear Transparent Wireless Earbuds with LED Display - Premium Sound & Style
product_details.description:
• Sleek transparent design showcasing high-tech internals with stunning LED blue lighting effects
• Digital LED display shows precise battery level and connection status
• Advanced touch controls for seamless music and call management
• Clear see-through charging case with modern aesthetic appeal
• Left/Right channel indicators for easy identification
• Ergonomic ear tip design for comfortable, secure fit
• High-quality stereo sound with deep bass response
• Wireless charging case with LED power indicator
• Bluetooth 5.0+ technology for stable connectivity
• IPX5 water-resistant protection for workout sessions
• Premium build quality with durable transparent materials
• Quick pairing technology for instant device connection

banner_details:
This banner features a modern tech-inspired design promoting wireless earbuds. The layout is clean and structured with text areas placed primarily on the left, allowing the right side to showcase the product image prominently. The background uses a subtle dark gradient with glowing radial and linear accents that enhance the tech vibe. The main heading ("heading") is bold and futuristic, followed by a smaller subheading ("subheading") in a tech-style font. A highlighted badge ("discount_badge" and "discount_text") showcases a promotional offer. Key features ("features") are listed using bullet points for readability. The price ("price") is large and bold, and the call-to-action button ("cta_button" and "cta_text") completes the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Navy: #0C0C14
- Twilight Purple: #1E1E2A
- Electric Violet: #6A4DFF
- White: #FFFFFF
- Soft Blue Glow: #5D3FD3
product_color: The product image features a sleek, transparent wireless earbud set with a futuristic digital display at its center. The dominant color palette includes deep black (#000000), chrome gray (#A9A9A9), neon blue-purple glow (#5C33FF), and bright white (#FFFFFF), which together emphasize a modern, high-tech aesthetic. The transparent casings subtly blend the darker inner technology with the glowing blue accents, giving it a sci-fi look. The neon blue highlights energy and innovation, while the digital white interface pops sharply against the dark casing. These colors work harmoniously, offering high contrast and visual appeal ideal for a bold and tech-forward advertisement banner.
